articles.title: Galileo satellites given green light for launch - Geospatial World
articles.description: Galileo satellites 27 – 28 are scheduled to be launched by a Soyuz launcher from Europe’s Spaceport in French Guiana on 2 December at 01:31 CET (1 December at 21:31:27 local Kourou time). Follow the launch live on ESA Web TV Two from 0104 CET. “Friday’s Launc…

articles.author: Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: European stocks set to fall sharply at open amid omicron vaccine fears - CNBC
articles.description: European stocks are expected to open sharply lower on Tuesday, with futures reversing themselves on new fears around the omicron Covid variant and vaccines.
articles.content:
LONDON European stocks are expected to open sharply lower on Tuesday, with futures reversing themselves on new fears around the omicron Covid variant and vaccines.

articles.author: By Forrest Brown and Marnie Hunter, CNN
articles.title: Southern African nations join European favorites on CDC's list for 'very high' travel risk - CNN
articles.description: Eight nations in southern Africa are listed at the CDC's Level 4 -- highest travel risk level for Covid-19. The countries are under various travel bans worldwide because of the Omicron variant of the coronavirus.
